name: Tank Survival V 0.1
description: This is my first game that I am proud of an have made entirely from scratch! (with a few tutorials:] ) I will be upgrading this game and adding actual tank models later on! right now it is just a simple infinite shooter.  Keep checking back for updates and the progress on the game! I might be posting videos about the progress of the game on my YouTube channel so please check it out! Also, credit to ChatGPT, I am a beginner coder so I don't know much so I got most if not all my help from there!
